com.fxcm.fix

Class UTCTimeOnly

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxcm.fix.UTCTimestamp
      • com.fxcm.fix.UTCTimeOnly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class UTCTimeOnly
extends UTCTimestamp
    UTCTimeOnly handles UTC time functionality. Time represented in UTC (Universal Time Coordinated, also known as "GMT")
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static UTCTimeOnly now()
        Convenience ThreadLocal instance of UTCTimeonly initialized with System.currentTimeMillis()
